resources.string: Ambilight, supreme business, fortitude and restraint. Swipe left and right to switch between three colors of black gold, black red, and champagne gold. It provides two ways of continuous playback and sliding playback. Three-finger swipe right to switch colors, and three-finger left swipe to switch playback modes.
Playback speed is switched to %1$s times
You need to download your signature png file from Yiran theme public account and put it on the phone [internal storage / Pictures /] The file name must be
